Package org.cleverbus.core.common.ws

Helper classes for Spring Web Services.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WsdlRegistry Contract for getting WSDLs overview.
 

Class Summary
ErrorCodeAwareSoapExceptionResolver Simple, SOAP-specific EndpointExceptionResolver implementation that stores the exception's message as the fault string.
ErrorCodeAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter Extension error handler that adds InternalErrorEnum into fault message.
HeaderAndPayloadValidatingInterceptor Interceptor that validates the presence of trace header.
WsdlRegistrySpringImpl Implementation of WsdlRegistry based on Spring capabilities that supposes the following prerequisites: all WSDLs are defined/published via SimpleWsdl11Definition Spring bean IDs will contain the WSDL name
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.common.ws Description

Helper classes for Spring Web Services. Among other things these classes extend ErrorAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter.
